title: Penalty for dodges should be increased
body:
This is getting _ridiculus_.
 I 've been queing for well over an hour and a half (ETA is only 3  mins to find match), and every single time either my team or the enemy, keeps dodging, game after game.
 And it's most of the time for no reason (in dillema between what champ to play and not picking in time, or not even picking anything at all).
 I 've been in over 10 lobbies so far, and every single one dodged. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
Seems to me, that 5 minutes RESTRICTION (not even ban) is **not** an appropriate penalty. It's fine if it's 5min at first, but then it should escalate if your average number of dodges per games played rises above a set level.

**Thoughts / Opinions?**

replies.body: You must be picking some troll as shit to get that many dodges. Its not a problem if anything waiting 5mins is to long for dodging. You have to be able to dodge because people try hold champ select hostage.
It's tilting when you get mid 3 x and then the 4th queue pop gives you support. That's tilting af.

Are you sure the dodge penalty is only five minutes? I swear I've seen some longer than that, but I could be wrong.
Either way, I don't see the issue with someone dodging? They're simply unhappy with the role they're given or that their desired champ has been banned so they decided that instead of having a bad game they'd prefer to wait a few minutes in hopes to get their desired position and champion to have an enjoyable match.
I find it quite hard to believe that you were in queue for more than an hour and a half. I presume you were playing summoners rift ranked with the wait time being approx. 3 minutes before a match was found.

Like @Fizz Mortune said, you must have been picking something quite odd to have that many dodges. If that isn't the reason then you must be quite the unlucky person or the fact that you're in silver.
